pages.text: Several $(l)locked$() rooms can be found inside Vaults. Behind the sturdy door is a $(l)Treasure Room$().$(br2)A Treasure Room can be opened with the corresponding $(l)Treasure Key$() to reveal its treasures inside.$(br2)These can only be $(l)crafted$() by the player by combining a $(l)Blank Keys$() with a $(l)Gem Cluster$().

pages.title: The Treasures
pages.text: Inside, a $(l)Treasure Chest$() is found, alongside piles of $(l)Treasure Sand$().$(br2)Treasure Chests contain $(l)very rare loot$(), and are $(l)not$() affected by Item Quantity or Item Rarity.$(br2)Mining Treasure Sand has a chance of containing very $(l)valuable$() items.
